Title: Supporting Code Review by Automatic Detection of Potentially Buggy Changes
Published: International Conference: Beyond Databases, Architectures and Structures
Purpose: A Method to detect possibly buggy change based on a classifier trained using a project's history
Summary: In this paper they present such a solution integrated with code review tools. It is based on a SVM classi er that indicates potentially buggy changes.
Outcome: An integration of the classi er into the code review system Gerrit, the implementation is availabe on https://github.com/mfejzer/CommitClassification
